ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A Realization...
ygData.msgSnippet: That was the judgement call I made.  The dex drop was insignificant, especially since I use Chant of Battle anytime I m not using Anthem.  The Stamina gain and
ygData.messageBody:
That was the judgement call I made. The dex drop was insignificant,
especially since I use Chant of Battle anytime I'm not using Anthem. The
Stamina gain and AC increase were more beneficial from what I've seen so
far.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Marc Allie [mailto:marcallie@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2000 12:49 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] A Realization...


All this talk about Stamina got me to thinking.

Given the following facts:

1. AC is king.
2. The "Magic Number" of stats is 75. That is, below 75 in any
stat,
you get a substantial benefit by stat bonuses.
3. I am wearing Carnal Pauldrons, AC 9 Dex +7
4. I COULD be wearing Crested Spaulders, AC 11 STA +6
5. My Dexterity is 114 now.
6. My Stamina is the Half Elven base 70.

I should in all likelihood ditch the Carnal Pauldrons and wear
Crested
Spaulders.

Didn't GZ state that the effect of Dex on missing notes in songs
capped at 100? Unless I am going to miss SUBSTANTIALLY more notes
with 107 Dex than I do now at 114, I can see no reason not to switch.

The extra 2 AC and hit point bonus from 70 to 76 Sta should easily
outweigh the Dex, unless I am mistaken.

Comments?

Pistov Kazidaizahlot
40th Bard of Cazic-Thule
"Where have all the Kobolds gone?"
